text: Listen, Morty, I hate to break it to you but what people call “love” is just a chemical reaction that compels animals to breed.
author: Rick Sanchez, Rick and Morty

text: Nobody exists on purpose. Nobody belongs anywhere. We’re all going to die. Come watch TV.
author: Morty Smith, Rick and Morty

text: What about the reality where Hitler cured cancer, Morty? The answer is: Don’t think about it.
author: Rick Sanchez, Rick and Morty

text: He’s not a hot girl. He can’t just bail on his life and set up shop in someone else’s.
author: Beth Smith, Rick and Morty

text: That’s planning for failure, Morty. Even dumber than regular planning.
author: Rick Sanchez, Rick and Morty

text: Get off the high road Summer. We all got pink eye because you wouldn’t stop texting on the toilet.
author: Rick Sanchez, Rick and Morty

text: I’m not looking for judgement, just a yes or no. Can you assimilate a giraffe?
author: Rick Sanchez, Rick and Morty

text: It’s fine, everything’s fine. There’s an infinite number of realities, Morty, and in a few dozens of those I got lucky and turned everything back to normal.
author: Rick Sanchez, Rick and Morty

text: You’re not gonna believe this, because it usually never happens, but I made a mistake.
author: Rick Sanchez, Rick and Morty

text: If I’ve learned one thing, it’s that before you get anywhere in life, you gotta stop listening to yourself.
author: Jerry Smith, Rick and Morty

text: Uncertainty is inherently unsustainable. Eventually, everything either is or isn’t.
author: Rick Sanchez, Rick and Morty

text: What, so everyone’s supposed to sleep every single night now? You realize that nighttime makes up half of all time?
author: Rick Sanchez, Rick and Morty

text: What’s wrong Rick? Is it the quantum carburetor or something?
author: Morty Smith, Rick and Morty

text: Morty, you can’t just add a sci-fi word to a car word and hope it means something. Looks like something’s wrong with the micro-verse battery.
author: Rick Sanchez, Rick and Morty

text: Little tip, Morty. Never clean DNA vials with your spit.
author: Rick Sanchez, Rick and Morty
